text:
Dounia's Future Plans

<setup: Dounia excited, writing a letter>
<optional narration: A heartfelt letter unfolds.>
Dounia: "I want to arrange everything perfectly!"

Dounia: "Rodya, you must feel equal when you meet him."

Dounia: "I’ll live apart after the wedding. Independence matters."

---
<setup: Dounia hopeful, thinking of family>
<optional narration: A joyful reunion awaits.>
Dounia: "We might be together soon!"

Dounia: "Three years apart will end!"

Dounia: "I can’t wait to embrace you!"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia plans to work for a salary rather than as a charity, and expresses a desire for independence after her wedding.
